kodkod.core.fol2sat
Class AnnotatedBooleanValue

java.lang.Object
  kodkod.core.fol2sat.AnnotatedBooleanValue

public final class AnnotatedBooleanValue
extends java.lang.Object

Represents the result of translating a formula in first-order logic to SAT. An annotated boolean value consists of a BooleanValue, the BooleanFormulaAllocator and Bounds used to perform the translation, and various other information that can be used to optimize translation to CNF.

Author:
Emina Torlak
specfield:
value: BooleanValue
allocator: BooleanFormulaAllocator
bounds: Bounds
literals: bounds.relations -> lone IntRange
functions: set Relation
symmetries: set IntSet
invariant:
value.*inputs in allocator.factory.components

Method Detail

value

public BooleanValue value()
Returns the boolean value that is a translation of a formula in first order logic.

Returns:

bounds

public Bounds bounds()
Returns the bounds used to generate the leaves of this.value.

Returns:
this.bounds

symmetries

public java.util.Set<IntSet> symmetries()
Returns the symmetry classes of this.bounds.universe. Specifically, for each IntSet s_i in the returned set s, the atoms whose indeces are in s_i can be premuted without affecting the meaning of a formula whose leaves are a subset of bounds.relations.

Returns:
this.symmetries

allocator

public BooleanFormulaAllocator allocator()
Returns the formula allocator that was used to allocate variables to relations during translation.

Returns:
this.allocator

numPrimaryVariables

public int numPrimaryVariables()
Returns the number of primary boolean variables allocated during translation.

Returns:
sum(literals[Relation].size())

interpret

public TupleSet interpret(Relation r,
                          IntSet model)
Returns the set of tuples which this.bounds and the given model for this.value assigns to the specified relation. Specifically, the returned tupleset will contain a tuple t iff (a) t is in this.bounds.lowerBound[r] or (b) the model contains the literal from the range this.literalsFor(r) that represents t.

Returns:
the set of tuples which this.bounds and the given model for this.value assigns to the specified relation.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - - r = null || model = null
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - !this.bounds.contains(r)
